text: hin fingers and toes, and hypoplasia (underdevelopment) of the patellae (knee caps). Scoliosis may also be present. Many patients have also had mild and unspecific unusual facial features. The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for 17q23.1q23.2 microdeletion syndrome.
